<patriot014@h...> wrote:

Moon),
> the fic I'm going to write and release on the anniversary of
Ikedaya--
> July 6th (by our calendar, not the old Imperial calendar):
>
> ---
>
> Harada leaned on his spear, exasperated by the wait. Turning to
Okita,
> he grinned nervously.
>
> "Neh, Okita-kun, did you remember to wash your fundoshi?"
>
> "H-Harada-san?!"
>
> Harada suddenly felt a stealthy tapping on his shoulder. Turning
> around he saw Saitou, making final adjustments to his armor
> chestplate. "I've made sure to wash mine, Harada-kun. Very well, I
> might add."
>

>
> Just a little something to look forward to ^_^

M,

You are going to start a fire here! The numerous fudonshi addicts
that we have (ummm... I try not to be but... umm...) will be all
over you. Good luck on the fic and I can't wait to read it!

~wounds

p.s. are fudonshi's white or red? are there other colors?

messages.subject: FIC PREVIEW: Rokugatsu no Yume
messages.msgSnippet: A preview scene from Rokugatsu no Yume (A Dream of the Sixth Moon), the fic I m going to write and release on the anniversary of Ikedaya-- ... Harada leaned
messages.messageBody:
A preview scene from "Rokugatsu no Yume" (A Dream of the Sixth Moon),
the fic I'm going to write and release on the anniversary of Ikedaya--
July 6th (by our calendar, not the old Imperial calendar):

---

Harada leaned on his spear, exasperated by the wait. Turning to Okita,
he grinned nervously.

"Neh, Okita-kun, did you remember to wash your fundoshi?"

"H-Harada-san?!"

Harada suddenly felt a stealthy tapping on his shoulder. Turning
around he saw Saitou, making final adjustments to his armor
chestplate. "I've made sure to wash mine, Harada-kun. Very well, I
might add."

---

Just a little something to look forward to ^_^

--M.
